article_title: Trump knows free trade kills middle class
article_text:
He may be a demagogue, but he knows why the middle class is disintegrating

Trump and Sanders are only ones proclaiming the obvious truth

Trump has become presumed nominee adopting what should be a Democratic goal

article_metadata.description: In 1993 President Clinton decided that he had to philosophically become more like Republicans if he were to win a future election. The most disastrous concession he made was to abandon his party’s opposition to unregulated free international trade and get NAFTA passed, a solid Republican goal.
article_metadata.title: Trump knows free trade kills middle class | The Charlotte Observer
